channel.title: Adding drunk command
channel.description: Okay, People Are Suggesting that i add a command ::drunk So That Lets say you drink a keg It Gets You Drunk And Makes You Wobble, And Im Just Wondering What The Command Code Would Look Like? I've Tried Making one, But Just SO You Know My Server base is a 317, Help please, thanks.

item.title: Adding drunk command
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

well i know delta if you drink beer, you get drunk,so try that on your server, and you could figure the rest out, or…
you could just make a command with drunk ,and set the emote to the drunk emote, i think it would look a bit like this.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; sM("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
the player SE is the emote,
notice setAnimation? thats another one of the emotes, so play around with the emote ids, and you will get your desired command, im not exactly going to spoonfeed you

Read full topic
